coded_answer.p: I was really pleased to receive at your letter. Unfortunately Richard Brown is ill but I can help you as much as I can. So, I'm writtingwriting to reply for givingto give all the information you asked for.

Firstly, we've booked Palace Hotel, which is located in Central. The best way to get from the hotel to the conference itsis using the tube because it takes only 20 mininuteminuteminutes. The tube is 2 lineline 2 which is red colour. And your speachspeech would be better for the end of conference party. I'd suggest you to wearwear at least, semi formalsemi-formal wearsclothes such as a jacket with anotherother clothes.
Finally, I give you some suggestions which could spend for about 3 hours in the national museum in my area. The museum can be helpful to understand our country's history and art.
I look forward to seeing you soon.
ComputerThe computer is the most important invention in our life.

Some people might say the electricity is more important than any anotherother thinghthing. It's hard to say which is the most important invention. However, I'd say the computer is a more amazing invention rather than anotherother inventions such as the telephone, the car. Recently the computer ishas become really necessary and we can't manage to work without them. Not only is for bussiness, but also in for my life. For instance, when I want to contanctcontact with to my friend, it's quite helpful by usingto use e-mail. Before the computer had been invented, we couldn't possibly have lots of information easily and we couldn't contact with to foreign countries at the same time.
And also it's time to make new systemsystems which makes us use easier and more simple, so far more people can enjoy computercomputers more than before.

Despite Being an amazing invention, some timessometimes the computer makescauses a big problem, such as the millennium bug (some people called it the "2000 problem"), because computercomputers are not flexible enough like a human's brain. However, the computer is worth to useusing in our life until a more covenianceconvenient machine will beis invented.
